Class: noduleGrid

noduleGrid()

new noduleGrid()

A jQuery plugin to manage a nodule grid
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
options.availableNodules string | function <optional>
 "10" number of nodules externally rendered in the grid. Depends on _nodule-grid.jinja2
options.getNoduleCount string | function | object <optional>
 fn() function used to get the number of visible nodules
options.setNoduleCount string | function | object <optional>
 fn(noduleCount) function used to set the number of visible nodules
